UILanguageTooltip.message: The language used by the extension when displaying text.

SettingNotControllable.message: The extension cannot control this setting.

SettingControlledByOther.message: This setting is being controlled by another extension.

AllowExtensionNotificationsTooltip.message: Allow the extension to create a desktop notification when something important happens. Not recommended to disable.

BlockHyperlinkAuditingTooltip.message: Disable hyperlink auditing, a recent HTML feature designed for notifying trackers and analytic services when you click on a link.

DebugModeTooltip.message: Write messages to the debug log. Press the 'ctrl' key followed by the 'd' key to show the debug log.

NetworkError.message: Login request failed due to a network error. Please try again.

OfflineError.message: Login request failed because you appear to be offline. Please check if you are connected to the internet.

TimeoutError.message: Login request timed out after %{seconds} seconds. Please try again.

AbortError.message: Login request was aborted by the browser. Please try again.

UnexpectedServerResponse.message: Login request returned an unexpected server response (%{statusLine})

TooManyRequestsError.message: Too many failed login attempts. Try again later.

JoinText.message: SIGN UP FOR A VPN ACCOUNT

SettingsWarning.message: These settings are not in effect. They come into effect while you are connected to a region.

SettingsWarningConnected.message: These settings are in effect. They will be restored to Chrome's default settings when you disconnect from %{region}.

BypassWarning.message: Requests made to websites found on the Bypass List use a direct connection that is not protected by Private Internet Access™.

MaceTooltip.message: PIA MACE™ helps protect your privacy and security by blocking malicious content, trackers and ads.

WebRTCTooltip.message: Block Chrome from revealing your public and private IP addresses when WebRTC is being used. Not recommended to disable.

AdobeFlashTooltip.message: Block Chrome from running Adobe Flash. Adobe Flash can be used to reveal your public IP address. Not recommended to disable.

BlockUTMTooltip.message: Remove Urchin Tracking Model(UTM) parameters from URLs you click on. UTM parameters are used to track information about your visit to a website.

BlockNetworkPredictionTooltip.message: Disable Chrome from using a network prediction service that pre-resolves DNS queries and pre-fetches webpages from the content found on a page you visit.

BlockLocationAccessTooltip.message: Block websites from accessing information about your physical location.

BlockHTTPRefererTooltip.message: Disable Chrome from sending the address of the current webpage to another webpage when following a link.

BlockThirdpartycookiesTooltip.message: Disable Chrome from accepting cookies from third party websites. Third party cookies can be used to track your visit to a website by a third party website or web service.

BlockCameraAccessTooltip.message: Block websites from accessing your computer's camera.

BlockMicrophoneAccessTooltip.message: Block websites from accessing your computer's microphone.

UseRegionLocaleTooltip.message: The default locale and language settings of your browser are kept private by replacing them with the locale and language settings of the current region.

CannotUsePIAMessage.message: Private Internet Access cannot be used because another extension is controlling your browsers proxy settings.

UpgradeChromeMessage.message: Private Internet Access cannot be used because your version of chrome is outdated. Please upgrade your browser to Chrome v48 or later.

AuthFailMessage.message:
If you recently changed your password on the Private Internet Access website then re-authenticating with the extension might fix this error.

For help and support, contact our support team.

ConnectionFailMessage.message: You might have lost connectivity to the internet, your connection might have been temporarily interrupted, or the Private Internet Access server you are connecting to might have connectivity issues.
